means: 打呼噜，打鼾( snore的现在分词 )

word_mean: 睡眠中发出鼻息声的表现。

sentence.Network_en: Rolando lay sprawled on his stomach, snoring.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗兰多趴着睡着了，四肢摊开，打着呼噜。

sentence.Network_en: He was snoring when Desmond awakened him.
sentence.Network_cn: 德斯蒙德叫醒他的时候他还在打呼噜呢。

sentence.Network_en: I could hear Paul snoring in the next room.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听得见保罗在隔壁房间里打呼噜。

entry.def: When someone who is asleep snores, they make a loud noise each time they breathe.

example.ex: His mouth was open, and he was snoring.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of snoring or producing a snoring sound
1. breathing during sleep with harsh noises caused by vibration of the uvula or soft palate;

auth_sentence.content: He fell swiftly asleep, and his snoring increased.
